title: LF Jg/Top DIAMOND 3++
body:
Any mid/high level diamond players here?

Have 2 team openings, possibly 3 in a mid/high level diamond team that i'll be coaching/managing. Its gonna be serious, aiming for at least diamond in ranked 5's in the 2015 season. 

Current roles needed: 
Jungle
Top

3rd possible role:
Support

Currently the team averages at diamond 3. So post IGNS below if interested. 

Discussion can be had through PM.

replies.body:
I'm only Diamond 5 currently, but it would be great if you could consider me?

XSirCution - Diamond 5 - 9 points
This guy is a god @ lee sin, he is the best outsecer if ive ever seen one
